title: Attack Move Click Option 7.15
body: I've noticed that in the new patch notes that we can now toggle on attack move lick to Left Mouse Button but when I try it doesn't work or is not there? Has anyone figured this out or is rito trolling again? (was extremely happy to see this){{item:3073}}

replies.body: The option is specifically in-game, and not available through the client settings.  You will find it at the very bottom of the hotkeys options, [here](https://imgur.com/aAxGzpC).
Thank you! I was looking for this..
